data.title: Dean David Cameron appointed Special Advisor to the President and Provost
data.text:
Professor David Cameron, Dean of the Faculty of Arts & Science, has been appointed Special Advisor to the President and Provost for a two-year term effective January 1, 2020 to December 31, 2022.

Drawing on his strengths and experience as a thoughtful, collaborative and widely respected leader, Professor Cameron will provide valuable advice on a range of key institutional files.

Professor Cameron will be completing his term as Dean of the Faculty of Arts & Science on June 30, 2019, a role he has performed with distinction.

He has served in many other roles at the University of Toronto, including: Vice-President, Institutional Relations and Chair of the Department of Political Science. In addition to extensive advisory and administrative work for the Government of Canada, Professor Cameron has served in a series of senior positions for the Government of Ontario, including: Deputy Minister, Intergovernmental Affairs; Deputy Minister and Special Advisor to the Premier on Constitutional Reform; and Special Constitutional Advisor to the Premier of Ontario.
